item.title: FairPlay：一种新型DApp
item.description: 什么是FairPlay FairPlay 使用智能合约进行公平透明的自动抽奖。 它允许任何人创建并参与抽奖等电商营销活动。 根据Google Analystics，

item.title: FairPlay: a new type of DApp
item.description: Credits: FairPlay is developed by Second State, an open source enterprise smart contract platform, and deployed on the CyberMiles public blockchain. What is FairPlay FairPlay uses smart contracts to conduct automated prize draws that are fair and transparent. It allows anyone to create and participate in product giveaways and e-commerce marketing campaigns. Since its launch, FairPlay has routinely reached a DAU (Daily Active Users) of 1000 (according to Google Analytics), with each giveaway receiving hundreds of on-chain transactions, making it one of the most popular DApps of all public blockchains.
